attributes.action: to ban extremist Muslims marching through Wooton Basset, Wilts.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It has been published in the press this week that Muslim extremists are planning on marching through Wootton Bassett.
We believe this should stopped as it is going against what this country stands for.
When will their behavior become racist? I believe it already has!
Gorden Brown should stop this march and not permit any tv coverage!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
